set(JANSSON_DIR ${LIBPOMELO_DIR}/deps/jansson)

set(THIRDPARTY_INC
  ${THIRDPARTY_INC}
  ${JANSSON_DIR}/src
)

link_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${JANSSON_DIR}/build/Default)

set(THIRDPARTY_LINK
  ${THIRDPARTY_LINK}
  jansson
)
